ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Dual Wield Cap {eqbard}
ygData.msgSnippet: They appear to have bumped the Dual Wield cap in the patch in which they alleged that they were raising the Defense cap.  Every Bard I know has seen Dual Wield
ygData.messageBody:
They appear to have bumped the Dual Wield cap in the patch in which they alleged that they were raising
the Defense cap. Every Bard I know has seen Dual Wield go up a lot. I THINK I saw one Defense raise, I'm
not positive.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 57 songs, Innoruuk


Matt DeBarger wrote:

> Weird thing this wekeend. At 51 my dual wield was 203, never moved after
> hopping up to that in the first bub.
> I am less than halfway through 52 (2 unrezzed deaths though, ouch) and my
> dual wield is at 216 now??? How is our cap caluculated?
>
> Elfson Allegro 52 Veeshan
